info.name: Halo Vault Minimalistic
info.description: A theme for the Halo Vault site to make it more transparent and feel futuristic and more Halo like. Also reccomended you have the Icebound theme selected on Halovault because i was too lazy to add those specific things i didnt change to effect the other themes
info.additionalInfo: This is not complete. If you find something really bad please let me know so i can try to update this theme.
